sn2.12:1.1: Standing to one side, the god Vishnu recited this verse in the Buddha’s presence:
sn2.12:2.2: who pay homage to the Holy One!
sn2.12:2.3: They apply themselves to Gotama’s instructions,
sn2.12:3.1: “Those who practice absorption in accord with the training”,
sn2.12:3.3: “in the way of teaching I’ve proclaimed,
sn2.12:3.4: they’re in time to be diligent;
sn2.12:3.5: they won’t fall under the sway of Death.”
